name: places/ChIJvyzFLUxYwokRxSmYU3af8L4
formattedAddress: 601 W 43rd St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 601 W 43rd St, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text:
The address for my package was wrong. ZERO notification via phone or email that the address was incorrect. Until I checked online since delivery was taking too long, then I realized address was wrong, corrected the address, then my delivery status changed to "awaiting for a customer pick up" - again, without ANY notification to email or to text message, why do we provide these details, when no one uses them?! Why did the status change from delivery to pick up? I need it to be delivered to me, address was updated, why do I have to go across town (it was not even brought to UPS store near me). There is NO WAY to speak to customer service representative, online chat is never available either. I needed the item by certain date, now with this incompetent delivery process I will have to return it.
Overall, all I can say, I hope Amazon takes all these incompetent companies out of business.
On the side note, the staff working at this location are polite and helpful. Just hope the crooked system is fixed.

originalText.text: One star is generous for them and is to only be able to write a review. I receive all packages to my address (from Amazon, Chewy, major retail stores) unless they are delivered via ups. Multiple times I was  home on the dates/times they “attempted” the delivery, but I didn’t not let the in, according to the ups tracking. This is ridiculous now - I got 2 other packages on the same date  but ups marked it as I was not home. Then they drove who knows where my package with food, tracking showed that it was supposed to be redelivered next day only to receive an update at night that it will be dropped off at an access point near me next day. At this point , I have doubts if ups drivers actually show up at my door when they say I was not home!  I tried to call and change it, but their cust service is only good at saying they can’t help. Also, maybe your drivers should attempt actually deliver all packages, follow the instructions/ call the number/ buzz neighbors/ or whatever Amazon delivery ppl do to get inside the building (when I am not even home!).This is ridiculous - waiting for a food package staying home, adding notes on my doors that I am home with my phone number!!! for 3 days (plus initial delivery was postponed due to holidays) while your delivery ppl have it somewhere “out for delivery.” Also, they previously had a 20+ lbs package dropped off at access point and I had to carry it home!Disgusting service UPS in New York, NY.

originalText.text: Yesterday Afternoon I was Attacked at the 137 Montague location from an employee he was. A black male with Locs or braids, he told me he was going to shoot and kill me. I had to call the police and make a report this situation should never had happened and he’s neede to be arrested and fired for trying to attack a women because he’s having a bad day i truly hope corporate get back to me soon so we can resolve this issue peacefully  and I do plan on taken legal action.

originalText.text: They came to deliver the package on a holiday, so there was no recipient. I updated them to deliver it on a working day between 10:00 and 17:00. However, they came outside of the specified time and claimed in the system that my address was incorrect, even though it was correct. This caused me to wait for the package for more than 5 days. I tried to contact them about my address three times, and they acknowledged it and said they would deliver it, but nothing has changed. And today, I still haven't received it.

originalText.text: UPS lost my package from Amazon. Address was correct on Amazon, and UPS was having “technical errors” on its dumb website and wouldn’t believe me. Then they told me this package was at THIS facility and it was OPEN UNTIL 9pm on both google and talking with customer support. I show up and it’s 826 and it’s doors are closed, and says my package is not there. YOU PEOPLE ARE ABSOLUTE HORSE **** im here right now and you can clearly see the time i posted and showed up. How hard is it people? And you want to get paid more??? Idiots. Also this seems to be an occurring problem across all customers at this location….. and let me guess, they will post the same automated message like at all the other posts just like this one.
